en: Narrator: It is a lovely sunny day and Peppa and George are riding their bicycles.
cn: 旁白：今天天气晴朗，佩奇和乔治在骑自行车。

en: Mummy Pig: That’s a fine pumpkin, Daddy Pig.
cn: 猪妈妈：那是个很棒的南瓜，猪爸爸。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig is very proud of his pumpkin.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸为他的南瓜感到非常自豪。

points.en: is very proud of his pumpkin
points.cn: 为他的南瓜感到非常自豪

en: Daddy Pig: Pumpkins are the only thing I can grow. Probably because I love pumpkin pie.
cn: 猪爸爸：南瓜是我唯一能种出来的东西，大概因为我喜欢南瓜派。

sentence.en: the only thing I can grow
sentence.cn: 我唯一能种出来的东西

examples.en: the only thing I can cook
the only thing I can fix

en: Peppa Pig: Come on, George. Danny! Suzy! Rebecca!
cn: 佩奇：快点，乔治。丹尼！苏茜！丽贝卡！

en: Narrator: Peppa and her friends, Danny Dog, Suzy Sheep and Rebecca Rabbit, are riding their bicycles. George is riding his tricycle.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和她的朋友丹尼狗、苏茜羊和丽贝卡兔在骑自行车。乔治骑着三轮车。

en: Peppa Pig: He’s going so slowly.
cn: 佩奇：他骑得好慢。

en: Danny Dog: Let’s race to Daddy Pig’s pumpkin.
cn: 丹尼狗：我们来比赛，看谁先到猪爸爸的南瓜那里。

sentence.en: Let's race to Daddy Pig’s pumpkin
sentence.cn: 我们来比赛，看谁先到猪爸爸的南瓜那里

examples.en: Let's race to the top of the hill
examples.cn: 我们来比赛，看谁先到山顶

examples.en: Let's race to the playground
examples.cn: 我们来比赛，看谁先到游乐场

en: Peppa Pig: If we race to Daddy’s pumpkin, we have to be very careful not to bump into it. Daddy would be very sad if the pumpkin got broken.
cn: 佩奇：如果我们去爸爸的南瓜那里比赛，一定要小心别撞到南瓜。要是南瓜坏了，爸爸会很伤心的。

points.en: be very careful not to bump into it

sentence.en: Daddy would be very sad if the pumpkin got broken
sentence.cn: 要是南瓜坏了，爸爸会很伤心的

examples.en: Daddy would be very sad if the toy got broken
examples.cn: 要是玩具坏了，爸爸会很伤心的

examples.en: Daddy would be very sad if the car got scratched
examples.cn: 要是车被刮花了，爸爸会很伤心的

en: Danny Dog: Don’t worry, Peppa. Race you.
cn: 丹尼狗：别担心，佩奇。来比赛吧。

en: Narrator: Peppa and her friends are racing to Daddy Pig’s pumpkin.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和她的朋友们正在朝猪爸爸的南瓜比赛。

en: Daddy Pig: Hey, watch out for my pumpkin.
cn: 猪爸爸：嘿，小心我的南瓜。

examples.en: watch out for my car
watch out for my cake

en: Danny Dog: Hurrah!
cn: 丹尼狗：万岁！

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, look out. Daddy’s pumpkin.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，小心，爸爸的南瓜。

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：对不起，爸爸。

en: Peppa Pig: Look at George. He’s going so slowly. George is still riding a baby bike.
cn: 佩奇：看乔治，他骑得好慢。乔治还在骑小孩子的自行车。

en: Danny Dog: Yours is a baby bike too, Peppa. You’ve still got stabilisers.
cn: 丹尼狗：佩奇，你的也是小孩子的自行车，你还有辅助轮。

examples.en: You’ve still got training wheels
You’ve still got support wheels

en: Rebecca Rabbit: I can ride without my stabilisers.
cn: 丽贝卡兔：我不用辅助轮也能骑。

sentence.en: I can ride without my stabilisers

examples.en: I can read without my glasses
I can swim without my armbands

en: Suzy Sheep: Me too.
cn: 苏茜羊：我也是。

en: Danny Dog: And me.
cn: 丹尼狗：我也是。

en: Danny Dog: Let’s ride up the hill again. Are you coming, Peppa?
cn: 丹尼狗：我们再骑上山吧。佩奇，你来吗？

examples.en: Are you coming to the park?
Are you coming to the party?

en: Peppa Pig: No, I think I’ll stay here.
cn: 佩奇：不了，我想留在这里。

en: Suzy Sheep: See you later.
cn: 苏茜羊：待会儿见。

en: Peppa Pig: Bye.
cn: 佩奇：再见。

en: Narrator: Peppa wishes she did not have stabilisers on her bicycle.
cn: 旁白：佩奇希望她的自行车没有辅助轮。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, I don’t want stabilisers anymore.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，我不要辅助轮了。

examples.en: I don’t want this balloon anymore
I don’t want that teddy bear anymore

en: Daddy Pig: Do you think you can ride without them?
cn: 猪爸爸：你觉得没有辅助轮能骑吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes.
cn: 佩奇：可以。

en: Daddy Pig: All right, Peppa. Let’s take them off.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧，佩奇，我们把它们拆掉。

examples.en: Let’s take off your shoes
Let’s take off the stickers

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig is taking the stabilisers off Peppa’s bicycle.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸正在给佩奇的自行车拆辅助轮。

en: Mummy Pig: Are you sure you want to ride without stabilisers?
cn: 猪妈妈：你确定不要辅助轮了吗？

sentence.en: Are you sure you want to ride without stabilisers?
sentence.cn: 你确定不要辅助轮了吗？

examples.en: Are you sure you want to go outside?
Are you sure you want to eat this?

en: Peppa Pig: Yes.
cn: 佩奇：确定。

en: Mummy Pig: You’ve never done it before.
cn: 猪妈妈：你以前没试过哦。

en: Peppa Pig: I can do it. I can, I can.
cn: 佩奇：我能行，我能行，我能行。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s not funny.
cn: 佩奇：不好笑。

en: Narrator: Riding without stabilisers is not easy.
cn: 旁白：没有辅助轮骑车可不容易。

sentence.en: Riding without stabilisers is not easy
sentence.cn: 没有辅助轮骑车可不容易

examples.en: Swimming without armbands is not easy
examples.cn: 没有臂圈游泳可不容易

examples.en: Watching movies without subtitles is not easy
examples.cn: 没有字幕看电影可不容易

en: Daddy Pig: Would you like some help, Peppa?
cn: 猪爸爸：佩奇，要我帮忙吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, please, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：要，谢谢爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: All right. Ready, steady, go.
cn: 猪爸爸：好，准备，预备，走！

en: Peppa Pig: Don’t let go, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，别松手。

en: Daddy Pig: Don’t worry. I’ve got you.
cn: 猪爸爸：别担心，我抓着你呢。

en: Mummy Pig: You’re doing really well, Peppa.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，你做得很好。

en: Peppa Pig: Hold on, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，抓紧我。

en: Daddy Pig: Just keep pedalling.
cn: 猪爸爸：继续踩踏板。

examples.en: Just keep swimming
Just keep running

en: Narrator: Peppa is riding on her own without stabilisers.
cn: 旁白：佩奇已经自己骑车了，没有辅助轮。

points.en: riding on her own without stabilisers

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, you let go.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，你松手了。

en: Daddy Pig: You’ve been cycling on your own for ages.
cn: 猪爸爸：你已经自己骑了很久了。

sentence.en: You’ve been cycling on your own for ages
sentence.cn: 你已经自己骑了很久了

examples.en: You’ve been reading for ages
You’ve been playing for ages

en: Peppa Pig: Have I?
cn: 佩奇：是吗？

en: Mummy Pig: You’re really very good at it.
cn: 猪妈妈：你真的很棒。

points.en: You’re really very good at it

en: Peppa Pig: Am I?
cn: 佩奇：真的吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Oh, I can do it. Look at me, look at me. I can ride my bike properly.
cn: 佩奇：哦，我会骑了。看我，看我，我会骑自行车了。

sentence.en: I can ride my bike properly

examples.en: I can swim properly
I can draw properly

en: Peppa Pig: Danny, Suzy, Rebecca, look. I don’t need my stabilisers anymore. Look at me.
cn: 佩奇：丹尼，苏茜，丽贝卡，看，我不用辅助轮了。看我！

en: Danny Dog, Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit: Hurrah!
cn: 丹尼狗、苏茜羊、丽贝卡兔：万岁！

en: Peppa Pig: Race you to Daddy’s pumpkin.
cn: 佩奇：我们来比赛，看谁先到爸爸的南瓜那里。

en: Peppa Pig: Whee!
cn: 佩奇：咻——！

en: Daddy Pig: Peppa, look out! My pumpkin!
cn: 猪爸爸：佩奇，小心！我的南瓜！

en: Peppa Pig: I’m going to win.
cn: 佩奇：我要赢了。

en: Narrator: Peppa is not looking where she is going.
cn: 旁白：佩奇没有看路。

points.en: not looking where she is going

en: Narrator: Oh, dear. Peppa has squashed Daddy Pig’s pumpkin.
cn: 旁白：哎呀，佩奇把猪爸爸的南瓜压扁了。

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry I squashed your pumpkin, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：对不起，爸爸，我把你的南瓜压扁了。

en: Daddy Pig: Never mind the pumpkin. The important thing is that you are okay. In future you really must look where you’re going.
cn: 猪爸爸：别管南瓜了，重要的是你没事。以后你一定要看路。

points.en: the important thing is that you are okay

en: Peppa Pig: I promise I will, Daddy
cn: 佩奇：我保证会的，爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: Good. Anyway, now the pumpkin is broken, I can make it into pumpkin pie.
cn: 猪爸爸：好。反正南瓜坏了，我可以做南瓜派了。

en: Peppa Pig: I love pumpkin pie.
cn: 佩奇：我喜欢南瓜派。

en: Mummy Pig: And because Daddy Pig’s pumpkin is so big, there will be enough pumpkin pie for everyone.
cn: 猪妈妈：而且猪爸爸的南瓜很大，大家都有南瓜派吃。

sentence.en: there will be enough pumpkin pie for everyone

examples.en: there will be enough cake for everyone
there will be enough ice cream for everyone
